- [x] - Pull LevelDB 1.20 into the upstream [bitcoin-core/levedb repo](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/leveldb). Currently at 1.19
- [x] - Update this repository with LevelDB 1.20. It is also currently at 1.19.
- [ ] - Write release notes portion outlining LevelDB performance improvements.

#### LevelDB 1.20 release notes

Convert documentation to markdown.
Implement support for Intel crc32 instruction (SSE 4.2). Based on [#309](https://github.com/google/leveldb/pull/309).
Limit the number of read-only files the POSIX Env will have open.
Add option for maximum file size.
